title: Clovis Goods 21S0301-36, 36 x 28 Inch Rectangular Frameless LED Bathroom Mirror (NEW)
item_description:
Clovis Goods 21S0301-36, 36 x 28 Inch Rectangular Frameless LED Bathroom Mirror (NEW)

Condition: NEW
Features:
The horizontal outline LED border lights to add soft illumination, making your reflection and smile brighter and clearer
This LED bathroom mirror light is dimmable and controlled with a touch-sensor switch 3 color temperature 3000K-6000K dimmable illuminates with a CRI of more than 95 LED lifetime - 50,000 hours (Using the mirror 3 hours a day means it will last 45 years ). The brightness settings are automatically stored, so you don't need to adjust the brightness every time
Specifications:
Material: Glass
Shape: Rectangle
Weight: 20 lbs
120VAC, 60Hz, 62W
Dimensions:
Width: 36 Inch
Thickness: 1 1/4 Inch
Height: 28 Inch
Photo Gallery Note: Representative photos were used for this lot.
